metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3862 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: mediaserver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows attackers to cause a denial of service (process crash) via unspecified vectors, aka internal bug 22954006.

notes.Note: sbeattie> mediaserver crasher so DoS only crash in malformed ID3 parsing jdstrand> as with previous stagefright issues, this issue affects Ubuntu's android packages, but not in a way that is exposed to apps.  See CVE-2015-1538 for details

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
